entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: TABS Pocket Edition
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫124,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫124,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Be the leader of red and blue wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created. When you grow tired of the 100+ wobblers at your disposal you can make new ones in the unit creator. You can also send your wobblers to fight your friends or strangers in online multiplayer! Features: -Campaigns -Multiplayer -Sandbox mode -Unit Possession -A bunch of silly units

entry.title: Pasha Planet: Reborn
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

‚ÄúPasha Planet: Reborn‚Äù is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters‚Äô daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay. [Game Overview] The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes! [Game Features] - Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan. - Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay. - Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes. - Challenging puzzles and stages.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: The Witness
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫179,99 [‚Ç∫179,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you. You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home. The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DayCost Pro - Personal Finance
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Three seconds a bill. Fast, Security and Easy to use is our aim, and iOS notification center widget. Look at other people how to say: ‚óé I just downloaded this app and I am so loving it already! It seems easy to use but I need to explore it more. ‚óé Very innovative work. Keep up guys. 5 star app. ‚óé It's quick to note down your expenses and helps you track your money. ‚óé Polished, smart, simple, with all functions of apps of this kind. Exactly the one I was looking for. Makes me delete other similar apps on my phone and keep only this one, really. ‚óé I love this app! It is clean, beautiful, very customizable, and user-friendly. I love the ability to make your own categories and accounts. And I also love the ability to put it in your pull-down Notification Center on your phone. It makes it quickly accessible during the day. Great job, love the app! Apple Watch: You can create incomes and expenses from your Apple Watch. The Glance shows your expenses of today, this month. FeatureÔºö ‚óé Three seconds only: pull down, fill money, choose category ‚óé iOS notification center widget: you can easily account when iPhone lock screen ‚óé Passcode security: everyone cannot open, only you. even double-click the Home button, in the App list can not view the data ‚óé Support more than 160 kinds of currency, conversion exchange rate automatic updates ‚óé Calculator: built-in calculator, more convenient and faster ‚óé Full gestures: fast billing basic ‚óé Humane beginners guide: for special operations, we guide the way through the animation + text, more intuitive, easier to understand ‚óé iCloud backup & restore ‚óé Dropbox backup & restore ‚óé Export data to CSV via Email ‚óé Recurring event, both expenses and incomes, with rich frequency options. ‚óé Allow custom theme color and wallpaper. ‚óé Allow add transaction from template. BasicÔºö ‚óé Expense & Income bills can be added photos ‚óé Income, Expense, Transfer, the others have ‚óé Graphical reports, allowing you to easily view the balance of payments situation year / month / week ‚óé Budget management: give yourself a reason to control consumption ‚óé A variety of color themes and wallpaper, allows you to fully personalize ‚óé Custom categories and consumption expenditure accounts, more in line with your needs ‚óé Supports iPhone & iPad ‚óé Daily reminder IncreaseÔºö ‚óé Easy copy history through gestures and automatically positioned in the day consumption date, you only need to modify the money can be. of course, you can use the existing money saved directly ‚óé You can also add categories and account when billing editing, click on the banner to change currency If you give up because of difficulties If you give up because of busy If you want to know where expenses If you want to save money If „ÄÇ„ÄÇ„ÄÇ Try our "DayCost" it, she will be your best assistant URL Schemes: DayCost:// Help translate DayCost: Contribute to the DayCost translation in your language. Let's make DayCost available to everyone in the world! We will show translator's info in DayCost, if you so desire. In addition, we also give several redemption code as a gift. have any suggestions or comments, please write to usÔºösupport@daycost.com

entry.title: 1941 Frozen Front Premium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫17,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫5,00 [‚Ç∫5,00 ~ ‚Ç∫17,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫5,00

In-App Purchases

  • 25,000 GoldÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • 700,000 GoldÔºö‚Ç∫3.999,99
  • 325,000 GoldÔºö‚Ç∫1.999,99
  • 125,000 GoldÔºö‚Ç∫799,99
  • 60,000 GoldÔºö‚Ç∫449,99

Application Description

Lead German forces on the rise towards the East or defend mother Russia on the Soviet side. Choose the right tactic of warfare and earn your stripes as an ingenious Commander at the FROZEN FRONT! Experience mind-blowing World War 2 battles in the brilliant new military STRATEGY-sim by HandyGames‚Ñ¢! MISSION BRIEFING FIGHT through the bone-chilling cold of the 1941 Eastern Front! COMBAT enemy positions with tanks and infantry! SHOOT hostile headquarters with mighty bomber wings! EMPLACE your artillery in rough terrain! SUPPLY your army with goods and ammunition! DEFEND yourself against superior numbers of enemies! Features: - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - Turn-based strategy action in WW2 - Thrilling campaigns and challenging missions - Hot-Hand multiplayer battles - Historical German and Soviet units - Repairs, camouflage and fortification of units during the battles - Infantry, artillery, tanks and warplanes for both fractions - Hex grid for the best overview possible - Detailed graphics and super-realistic sounds - MFi game controller support - Game Center support Thank you for playing ‚Äò1941 Frozen Front‚Äô!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Clouds & Sheep 2 Premium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫17,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫5,00 [‚Ç∫5,00 ~ ‚Ç∫17,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫5,00

In-App Purchases

  • 50 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • 1400 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫3.499,99
  • 650 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫1.999,99
  • 250 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫699,99
  • 120 GemsÔºö‚Ç∫349,99

Application Description

In this eagerly anticipated sequel of the game ‚ÄúClouds & Sheep‚Äù, the cute sheep are finally on the loose again! Solve countless quests and fulfill your wooly friends‚Äô needs. Plant grass, flowers, trees and shear your animals‚Äô different-colored wool to stock up your resources! Collect happy stars, harvest wood and flower petals and use them to provide your flock with food, accessories, toys and more! Control the clouds and make it rain to ensure your sheep never run out of fresh water to drink. If your sheep feel happy and content, they‚Äôll bring tiny lambs into the world! Every single animal is asking for your attention! The fluffy balls of wool love to be entertained. Make your sheep jump and use different toys like the trampoline, the seesaw and the swing to actively play with them! Watch your pets interact with each other and observe their reactions to the objects you give to them! Customize your flock‚Äôs pasture with fun objects and choose between different settings like the Wild West or Pirate scenery. Watch your flock run around by day and sleep by the cozy campfire at night. Do everything you can to keep your sheep happy and healthy to prevent them from becoming big, cottony clouds in the sky. Features: - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - Awesome sequel of the top game ‚ÄúClouds & Sheep‚Äù - Go on an epic adventure to find the legendary Fountain of Youth! - Simulation game with adorable sheep - Take care of your flock - Raise sweet little lambs - Actively play with your animals - Give them many different items and objects - Grow and harvest various resources - Shear your sheep - Customize their pasture - Control the weather - Day-night cycle - Open-ended game set in a 3D world - Suitable for kids, but also fun for the whole family - MFi game controller support - Game Center support Thank you for playing ‚ÄòClouds & Sheep 2‚Äô! Get in touch with HandyGamesTM: http://www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook: http://www.fb.com/handygames Stay tuned on Google+: http://goo.gl/qkjngm Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY Check news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/handy_games Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/handygames Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Townsmen Premium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫17,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫5,00 [‚Ç∫5,00 ~ ‚Ç∫17,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫5,00

In-App Purchases

  • Fast forwardÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • XP Buff x2Ôºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Medium Prestige PackÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • Small Prestige PackÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Awesome Prestige PackÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Insane Prestige PackageÔºö‚Ç∫3.499,99
  • Ultimate Prestige PackageÔºö‚Ç∫1.799,99

Application Description

Develop your tiny village to a grand medieval empire with a thriving economy and happy villagers! Find spots for mining ore, harvest the crops of your farms and collect coins as taxes from your folk. Build jousting fields, taverns, marketplaces and beautify your city with impressive statues, magnificent monuments, and lush gardens. But there are also dangers lurking close by. Bandits are in the area, looking to plunder and pillage your peaceful town. Build barracks, guard towers and recruit brave soldiers to protect your citizens from harm. You rule the whole empire from your castle and make sure your inhabitants have fun and stay happy! FEATURES - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - City-building gameplay set in medieval times - Cute inhabitants with their own daily routines - Complex economy sim and deep production chains - Dozens of different town and production buildings - Optional military feature with soldiers and bandits - Meaningful seasons and weather effects - Devastating disasters like fire, disease, drought and many more - Diverse scenarios and challenging tasks - Unrestricted sandbox gameplay mode - Game Center support

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Photo Eraser for iPhone
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

On Sale. Original $ 4.99. Photo Eraser magically remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone and instantly fix your photos. Powered by the latest revolutionary photo InPaint algorithm, Photo Eraser performs the best among all other iPhone erasers that ruin your photos, including popular professional photo processing softwares. A variety of experiments shows the intelligent Photo Eraser will give you better and more natural, amazing results than any similar tools. Photo Eraser quickly remove unwanted objects from photos for iPhone, including logo, text, data stamp, watermark, acnes, people... without any specialist knowledge and instantly fix the photos automatically as if they were never there. InPaint, improve and repair your photos. It targets to be a simple yet effective photo healing app for all iPhone users. Get the magical photos done in seconds-to-minutes instead of minutes-to-hours. People all over the world use Photo Eraser for iPhone every day to beautify their photos. Free download Eraser for iPhone today to be more creativity! Easy to get use & started. You only need mark unwanted area by red color, Photo Eraser for iPhone will make your photo much better in a minute. ‚Ä®‚Ä® Photo Eraser for iPhone features highlights: ‚Ä® ‚àö Remove watermarks, date stamps and much more unwanted objects from photos for iPhone.‚Ä® ‚àö Delete unwanted people from photo for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Erase text, signatures and other undated objects from photos for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Make skin imperfections vanish for iPhone. ‚Ä® ‚àö Completely non-technical. ‚àö Support all iPhone device: iPhone 6s+, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone6, iPhone 5s, iPhone5c, iPhones 5, iPhones 4s, iPhone4, iPhone 3gs‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ Reviews by our users: - Works pretty well! by rfgf1 It does a fairly thorough job of removing things from the backgrounds of pictures, or objects that are not in the main focus of the original. Using the lasso and only straight lines and drawing a box around the object to be removed, is where I have seen my best results. - Amazing by Twon from VA Works great! I'm using a iPhone 6, IOS 8 Feedback: ‚Ä®Any suggestion will be appreciated, support email: market@effectmatrix.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Wreckfest
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫69,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫11,99 [‚Ç∫11,99 ~ ‚Ç∫69,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫11,99

In-App Purchases

  • Modified Monsters Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Getaway Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Content Bundle 1Ôºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Off-Road Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Content Bundle 2Ôºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • Steel & Wheels PackÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Racing Heroes Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Rusty Rats Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • American All-Stars Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Goofy Roofs PackÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground! Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. ‚Ä¢ Unique Racing Experience ‚Äì Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas. ‚Ä¢ Awesome Cars ‚Äì Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won‚Äôt find anything like this in other games. ‚Ä¢ Meaningful Customization ‚Äì Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor ‚Äì Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between! ‚Ä¢ Multiplayer ‚Äì Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance! ‚Ä¢ Challenge modes ‚Äì Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! ‚Ä¢ Career Mode ‚Äì Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Oaken
entry.content:

entry.title: Dune: Imperium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫299,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫499,99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • Dune: Imperium - Rise of IxÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫349,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

In-App Purchases

  • Dune: Imperium - Rise of IxÔºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • Dune: Imperium - ImmortalityÔºö‚Ç∫449,99

Application Description

Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium! Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal. Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader. Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning. Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same! Control the Spice. Control the Universe. Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it. Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat‚Ä¶ or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Halls of Torment: Premium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss. First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile! „ÄêFeatures„Äë ‚óÜ Quick and casual 30 minute runs ‚óÜ Old school pre-rendered art style ‚óÜ Quest-based meta progression ‚óÜ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies ‚óÜ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns ‚óÜ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles ‚óÜ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds ‚óÜ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs ‚óÜ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor ‚óÜ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character ‚óÜ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds „ÄêFull Content List„Äë ‚óÜ6 stages with unique environments ‚óÜ11 playable characters & character marks ‚óÜ25 blessings that make you stronger for each run ‚óÜ68 unique items to retrieve and unlock ‚óÜ240 higher rarity item variants ‚óÜ74 abilities and ability upgrades ‚óÜ36 artifacts to customize your game experience ‚óÜ35+ unique bosses ‚óÜ70+ unique monsters ‚óÜ500 quests to complete ‚óÜ1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! „ÄêContact Us„Äë Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

  • The Riverfolk ExpansionÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Root: The Underworld ExpansionÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

  • Exiles & Partisans & VagabondsÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Hirelings & LandmarksÔºö‚Ç∫449,99

Application Description

Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness. The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance‚Äôs hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods. Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright. The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dark Reader for Safari
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫199,99 ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode. The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched. Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support. Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data. Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

MenubarX is a powerful menu bar browser. You can add any web pages to the menu bar just like Native Apps. It will open up a new world for Web Apps. * Awarded on ProductHunt Daily and Weekly * Reviewed as the most worthy menu bar App (@monograph) It perfectly supports various Web, WPA, and PWA websites. Enjoy all the WebApps services with just one link. You will instantly get various simulators, like iPhone, iPad, Android or even Kindle. It is a great productivity tool for Mac power users, making it possible to do anything in the menu bar, including searching, reading, watching videos, listening to music, and playing games with just one click. Up to 29+ features: 1. Unlimited Tabs 2. Unlimited Bookmarks 3. Custom Homepage 4. Custom Site Icon 5. Auto AdBlock support 6. Custom JS/CSS Script support 7. Pinned Window 8. Detach Window 9. Devices Simulator 10. Switch User-Agent 11. Resize Responsive 12. Auto Refresh 13. Boss Keys 14. Dark Mode 15. Shortcuts 16. 5 Languages Support 17. Download Manager 18. Colorful Icon Style 19. Web Notifications Push 20. Quick Search 21. Native App Mode 22. Background Audio 23. Local Debugging 24. Third-Part Integration 25. Low Memory Usage 26. Plenty of Web Apps 27. iCloud Sync support 28. Auto Destroy Page to release the resources 29. Local File Preview support 30. Custom User-Agent 31. Dark Mode for web pages 32. Custom Network Proxy(HTTP/Socks5) More powerful features will be developed. Feedback are welcome to tell me on Twitter:@MenubarX or MenubarX@gmail.com

entry.title: Frenzy Match! Dino Showdown
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫9,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • DiamondsÔºö‚Ç∫3.999,99

Application Description

Amidst the rock piles in the primeval jungle, Triceratops, Tyrannosaurus Rex, and Pteranodons are scattered and stacked‚Äîchaos is about to sweep through the tribe! As the top "organizer" in the tribe, your only mission is to **tap three identical dinosaurs to eliminate them from the pile**! But remember: the inventory slot below has limited space. Once it‚Äôs filled up with uneliminated dinosaurs, your primeval cleanup mission will fail immediately! This isn‚Äôt a casual game of random taps; it‚Äôs a strategic, forward-thinking brain challenge. Every choice you make determines whether you can survive the dino frenzy until the end! # Primeval Item Vault: Three "Lifesavers" to Break the Deadlock! When you‚Äôre cornered by a full inventory of dinosaurs and can‚Äôt find a matchable set, the three heirloom items of the tribe become your "last chance to turn the tide": - **Corn**: Is your inventory slot about to overflow? Use Corn to instantly clear out all selected dinosaurs in the slot, free up space with one tap, and let you replan your elimination order! - **Fig**: Missing just one dinosaur to complete a Match-3? The Fig will automatically lock onto the target dinosaur in your inventory, directly complete the set elimination, and help you break through the "stuck" predicament! - **Meat**: Are the dinosaurs on the field piled in disarray with no elimination opportunities in sight? Meat will completely shuffle the arrangement of all remaining dinosaurs, making new matchable sets take the initiative to "appear"! ## Core Gameplay: Every Step is a "Life-or-Death Prediction"! The difficulty of Primeval Match-3 lies in its "stacking logic" and "inventory management": Dinosaurs on the field are layered and covered‚Äîsome hidden at the bottom layer, others blocked by other dinosaurs. You can‚Äôt just look at the surface; you must first observe the types of dinosaurs in the lower layers, predict "what will be exposed after eliminating the upper layer," and then decide which set to eliminate first. For example: Eliminating 3 Pteranodons in the upper layer first may unlock 3 Triceratops in the bottom layer; but if you mindlessly tap scattered dinosaurs, you‚Äôll only fill up the inventory quickly and end up failing due to a full slot! As the levels progress, the number of dinosaur types will exceed 10, and the stacking layers will increase from 2 to 7 or 8. Some dinosaurs are hidden in "dead corners," while others require 2-3 consecutive eliminations to unlock. Only with patient analysis and careful choices can you avoid the crisis of a full inventory and clear all dinosaurs step by step! The elimination horn in the primeval jungle has sounded! Bring your strategic mind, make good use of your available items, find every breakthrough in the chaotic pile of dinosaurs, and don‚Äôt let the inventory slot become your "stumbling block"‚Äîset off now and become the "Primeval Match-3 Champion" admired by everyone in the tribe
